article.title: Sierra Nevada to Support Precision Strike Package Program
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Sierra Nevada Corporation, Sparks, Nevada, is being awarded a $45 million indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity, firm-fixed-price, cost-plus-fixed-fee, and cost-no-fee contract to procure products and services in support of the Precision Strike Package Program.Â Air Armament Center, Eglin Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
